participant_1.name: Emily Carter
participant_1.personality: Empathetic and adventurous, Emily enjoys making people laugh, even in tough times.
participant_1.background: I m originally from london , england. I love going to comedy clubs. I recently lost both my parents to an automobile accident. I like camping and the outdoors in general.

participant_2.name: Jake Thompson
participant_2.personality: Energetic and carefree, Jake has a quirky sense of humor and a laid-back attitude.
participant_2.background: I have a very unhealthy diet. I drink a lot of caffeine. I am very skinny and energetic. I have a cheap car my dad gave me.
